allow:
Bash(gh pr create --repo anthropics/claude-plugins-official --title "feat: add vibe plugin - SPEC-driven AI coding framework" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Plugin: vibe

SPEC-driven AI coding framework for Claude Code with parallel agents, BDD verification, and quality assurance.

### Features

- **12 Slash Commands**: `/vibe.spec`, `/vibe.run`, `/vibe.verify`, `/vibe.review`, `/vibe.reason`, `/vibe.diagram`, and more
- **16 Specialist Agents**: Security, performance, architecture reviewers + language-specific reviewers \(Python, TypeScript, React, Rails\)
- **ULTRAWORK Pipeline**: Parallel execution with ~50% speed improvement through background agents and phase pipelining
- **BDD Verification**: Behavior-driven development testing against SPEC requirements
- **Context7 Integration**: Built-in support for up-to-date documentation lookup

### Workflow

```
/vibe.spec "feature" → /vibe.run "feature" → /vibe.verify "feature"
```

### Repository

https://github.com/su-record/vibe

### License

MIT
EOF
\)")
